Description.Text: Hotel Perinthos is located near the city center and its suburbs, at 12 km from Thessaloniki, away from the town noise. Alexander the Great`s grave, the Axios River`s aquatic and the archeological area of Vergina and Dion are within walking distance. All rooms, furnished in a modern style, come along with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV, wireless internet access, telephone and minibar. The hotel features a spacious breakfast area, a snack bar, an outdoor swimming pool and a pool bar. Self-parking is also available.
